s1.title: Step through a pipeline easily
s1.p: Avalon Excalibur's pipeline package is located at org.apache.avalon.excalibur.pipeline (in the Scratchpad jar). It is designed to allow you to set up an arbitrary pipeline that is stepped through. As each stage is retrieved, you can perform any operations on it that you need.
The pipeline code does function, but it may be restructured at any time.
